name: kinesis-to-kafka-rakuten
description: DCOS package for deploying kinesis-consumer and publishing the result to kafka topic vikilitics_events.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. Kinesis-to-kafka on DC/OS is in alpha and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
postInstallNotes: Kinesis-to-kafka service has been installed. Check the DC/OS UI for status.
